title: The Awakening of Angela Mercy
description: Angela Mercy has been in a coma for almost a year, her mind has been broken by one man and her heart loved by another. Will she find herself again when she awakens or will the darkness pull her back?Please note: This book contains adult content, violence and sexual content. This book is for mature readers only.Copyright Cover art by Spiderwick Designs 2013 - 2014
author: Lori Meckley
